author: kingpanther13
releaseNotes:
v0.4.3 - Comprehensive bug fixes:

- CRITICAL: Fix NullPointerException in evaluateComparison when device attribute is null
- CRITICAL: Fix race conditions in duration timers by migrating to atomicState
- CRITICAL: Fix unbounded cancelledDelayIds memory leak
- HIGH: Fix lost event context after delay actions (preserves %device%/%value% substitution)
- HIGH: Fix sunrise/sunset rescheduling drift using getSunriseAndSunset()
- HIGH: Fix applyDeviceMapping missing multi-device (deviceIds) arrays on rule import
- HIGH: Fix response size guard to use byte count instead of char count
- HIGH: Fix non-JSON update response incorrectly assumed success
- HIGH: Invalidate item backup cache after successful code updates
- HIGH: Wrap all action types in try-catch to prevent one failure from aborting remaining actions
- MEDIUM: Add range validation for set_level, set_color, delay, and repeat actions
- MEDIUM: Fix formatTimeInput validation to prevent malformed cron expressions
- MEDIUM: Fix device_was event window with 2-second margin
- MEDIUM: Fix Elvis operator on limit:0 for get_device_events
- MEDIUM: Add textParser to hubInternalPostForm for non-JSON responses
- MEDIUM: Warn when install tools cannot extract new app/driver ID
- LOW: Fix comment/code mismatches in backupItemSource
